title: Expanding Mathematical Thinking Through Mobile Learning: Administrator Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational statistics and business mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers/leaders to enhance math learning competencies using mobile devices, conducted in a BYOD environment with a blended design integrating online modules and offline workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies using mobile devices.
Learners can write a business case analysis report using data visualization tools in a blended learning environment.
Learners can collaborate with peers in a mobile learning community to propose solutions for optimization problems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
